value.title: US Senate candidate runs on anti-Tesla “Full Self Driving” platform
value.excerpt: Single-issue candidates for the US Senate aren't the usual fodder for Ars' car coverage, but it seems like an exception might exist for Dan O'Dowd. O'Dowd, an engineer and CEO of a software company, is running for one of California's Senate seats on a platform to ban Tesla's "Full Self Driving" feature.
